name: Word Woot for iPhone
description:
ADDICTING GAMEPLAY
Your finger is your pen as you click your way across lettered blocks to spell words and score points!

SPARKLEY SPECIAL EFFECTS
You won't believe your eyes when you see the colorful explosions for correctly spellings words. Word Woot brings a whole new level of style and excitement to word games.

HIGH DEFINITION GRAPHICS
A stunning display of colors and sound puts Word Woot on a whole new level of quick play compared to other spelling games!

HIGH SCORE TRACKING
See your highest score, and most words in a single round to track your improvement!

Don't be the last of your friends to start playing the best spelling game ever, Word Woot!
